channel.title: Comments on: Where in the WoW?

item.title: By: Nonentity
item.dc:creator: Nonentity
item.description:
Zangarmarsh. Woo-ha. I ran through there last night on my way to Blade's Edge Mountains.
Goodbye, Space Mulgore (AKA Nagrand), I'll miss you.
item.content:encoded:
Zangarmarsh. Woo-ha. I ran through there last night on my way to Blade’s Edge Mountains.

Goodbye, Space Mulgore (AKA Nagrand), I’ll miss you.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: Yea as a hookah that would be a little inaccurate, but it could be modeled after a shisha, which has a large bowl at the top. You place your "tobacco" in the large bowl and then put a coal on top of it, so smoke would definitely be rising out of the top. My friend from Egypt had one, very fun.
item.content:encoded: Yea as a hookah that would be a little inaccurate, but it could be modeled after a shisha, which has a large bowl at the top. You place your “tobacco” in the large bowl and then put a coal on top of it, so smoke would definitely be rising out of the top. My friend from Egypt had one, very fun.

item.title: By: Cyndre
item.dc:creator: Cyndre
item.description:
At the risk of reveaing my vices, the hooka in the picture is acurate to a degree. When not being smoked, the substance that is lit in the 'bowl' of the hooka tends to smoke just like that. Its an ember effect, with the substance smouldering while it waits for you to pull the smoke through the aeration and out the tubes, via suction...
BTW, I never exhaled... or something.
either way, its definatly Zagermarsh, though I can't really be more specific.
item.content:encoded:
At the risk of reveaing my vices, the hooka in the picture is acurate to a degree. When not being smoked, the substance that is lit in the ‘bowl’ of the hooka tends to smoke just like that. Its an ember effect, with the substance smouldering while it waits for you to pull the smoke through the aeration and out the tubes, via suction…

BTW, I never exhaled… or something.

either way, its definatly Zagermarsh, though I can’t really be more specific.

item.title: By: Elliott
item.dc:creator: Elliott
item.description:
I'm going to guess somewhere near the sporregar.
Whoever designed that hookah has never smoked one, the smoke comes out the tube not the top piece.
item.content:encoded:
I’m going to guess somewhere near the sporregar.

Whoever designed that hookah has never smoked one, the smoke comes out the tube not the top piece.
